name: infinichess
description: Massively multiplayer infinite chess game - a fork of Xess/10kchess

scripts.build: node --check server/index.js && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/client dist/shared && cp client/*.html dist/ && cp client/*.css dist/client/ && cp client/*.js dist/client/ && cp -r client/assets dist/client/ && cp shared/constants.js dist/shared/ && cp client/_redirects dist/ && echo 'Build successful'
